channel.title: Texas on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Texas on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Horrifying screwworm infection confirmed in US traveler after overseas trip
item.description: It’s not a first—there was a case last year—but it’s still disturbing.

item.title: Time is running out for SpaceX to make a splash with second-gen Starship
item.description: SpaceX is gearing up for another Starship launch after three straight disappointing test flights.

item.title: James Talarico Is on the Run
item.description: WIRED spoke with the Texas state representative, who is hiding out in Illinois along with his colleagues in an attempt to stop Republicans from enacting an unprecedented redistricting plan.

item.title: James Talarico Is on the Run
item.description: WIRED spoke with the Texas state representative, who is hiding out in Illinois along with his colleagues in an attempt to stop Republicans from enacting an unprecedented redistricting plan.

item.title: Texas prepares for war as invasion of flesh-eating flies appears imminent
item.description: In Colombia, the parasites were caught expanding into endangered wild mountain tapirs.

item.title: Texas politicians warn Smithsonian it must not lobby to retain its space shuttle
item.description: Generating “…public resistance to the provision’s enforcement.”

item.title: Houston, you’ve got a space shuttle… only NASA won’t say which one
item.description: “The acting administrator has made an identification.”

item.title: The Texas Floods Were a Preview of What’s to Come
item.description: Mounting evidence shows no US state is safe from the flooding that ravaged Texas’ Kerr Country.

item.title: The Texas Floods Were a Preview of What’s to Come
item.description: Mounting evidence shows no US state is safe from the flooding that ravaged Texas’ Kerr Country.

item.title: Why Gov. Greg Abbott won’t release his emails with Elon Musk
item.description: The governor’s office says some emails contain “intimate and embarrassing” information.

item.title: “It’s a heist”: Senator calls out Texas for trying to steal shuttle from Smithsonian
item.description: “The title of this amendment is ‘Houston, We Have a Problem.’”
